md:
giải nghĩa từ "shortsighted" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Shortsighted** (adjective)

* Meaning: unable to see things clearly or far away; lacking foresight or wisdom.
* Vietnamese: cận thị (unable to see things clearly or far away); thiếu tầm nhìn xa (lacking foresight or wisdom).

Example sentence: "He was shortsighted and didn't realize the consequences of his actions."

* Related words: myopic (lacking foresight or wisdom), nearsighted (unable to see things clearly or far away), farsighted (able to see things clearly or far away).

Note: In Vietnamese, "cận thị" is used to describe someone who is nearsighted, while "thiếu tầm nhìn xa" is used to describe someone who lacks foresight or wisdom.
